mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 AND m.perms IS NOT NULL AND m.perms != ''

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.path, m.component, m.redirect, m.perms, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.hidden, m.status, m.level, m.tree_path, m.keep_alive, m.always_show, m.create_by, m.create_time, m.update_by, m.update_time, m.remark FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.order_num
SELECT m.id FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.order_num
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_menu WHERE parent_id = #{menuId}

SELECT id, parent_id, name, path, component, redirect, perms, type, icon, order_num, hidden, status, level, tree_path, keep_alive, always_show, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark FROM sys_menu WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY order_num

SELECT id, parent_id, name, path, component, redirect, perms, type, icon, order_num, hidden, status, level, tree_path, keep_alive, always_show, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark FROM sys_menu WHERE type = #{type} AND status = 1 ORDER BY parent_id, order_num
